00048 class CSwordBackend : public CBackend, virtual public SWMgr  {
00049 public:
00054   enum moduleOptions {
00055     footnotes   = 0x000000001,
00056     strongNumbers   = 0x000000002
00057     };
00058   enum errorCode {
00059         noError,
00060         noSwordConfigFile,
00061         noSwordModuleDirectory,
00062         noSwordModuleConfigDirectory,
00063         noModulesAvailable,
00064         unknown
00065     };
00066 
00072     CSwordBackend();
00076     ~CSwordBackend();
00083   virtual ListCSwordModuleInfo* getModuleList() const;
00089   virtual const errorCode initModules();
00095   virtual const bool shutdownModules();
00102   virtual void setOption( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type, bool enable);
00108   virtual const bool isOptionEnabled( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type);
00112     virtual void Load();
00116   virtual const QString getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const;
00120   const bool setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language );
00126   CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByDescription(const QString& description);
00132   CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByName(const QString& name);
00136   SWConfig* getConfig() const;
00142   const bool getModuleConfig(const QString& module, SWConfig& moduleConfig);
00143         
00144     CHTMLChapterDisplay* m_chapterDisplay;  
00145     CHTMLEntryDisplay* m_entryDisplay;
00146 
00147 protected:
00152     virtual void AddRenderFilters(SWModule *module, ConfigEntMap &section);
00153

00155     //filters
00156     SWFilter *m_gbfFilter;

00158     SWFilter *m_plainTextFilter;
00159     SWFilter *m_thmlFilter; 
00160     
00161     ListCSwordModuleInfo* m_moduleList;
00162     errorCode m_errorCode;
00163 };
00164 
00166 inline ListCSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBackend::getModuleList() const {
00167     return m_moduleList;
00168 }
00169 
00171 inline SWConfig* CSwordBackend::getConfig() const {
00172     ASSERT(config);
00173     return config;
00174 }
00175 
00177 inline const QString CSwordBackend::getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const {
00178         return QString::fromLatin1(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());  
00179 }
00180 
00182 inline const bool CSwordBackend::setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language ){
00183     LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.setDefaultLocaleName( language.local8Bit() );
00184     return true;
00185 }
